Package com.xrtb.bidder

Contains the core pieces of the bidding engine.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CampaignProcessor
    CampaignProcessor.
    CampaignSelector
    A singleton object that is used to select campaigns based on a given bid request.
    Controller
    A class for handling REDIS based commands to the RTB server.
    RTBServer
    A JAVA based RTB2.2 server.
    This is the RTB Bidder's main class.
    SelectedCreative
    A class that is used to hold a campaign and the associated creative that matches a bid request.
    WebCampaign
    A Singleton class that handles all the campaigns.html actions.

Package com.xrtb.bidder Description

Contains the core pieces of the bidding engine. The server, the pub/sub control mechanisms, and the campaign selection classes.
Author:
Ben M. Faul
